bibl.title: A Ptolemaic Canal in the Northeast Fayyum: The History of the Bahr Wardan
bibl.note: Introduction. - The canal's name [different parts of the canal had different names]. - Archaeological investigation of the canal. - Partial destruction of the canal in the 20th century AD. - The canal in aerial photography. - The canal at Hawwarah. - The canal's role in the abandonment of the northern Fayyum in Late Antiquity.
